ygData.subject: Re: By the way,
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve had some problem with people getting in my face after I get back from turning in my necklaces from the Nybright sister quest. They start shouting Kill
ygData.messageBody:
I've had some problem with people getting in my
face after I get back from turning in my necklaces
from the Nybright sister quest. They start shouting
Kill stealer when I take a sister every now and then
from this newly arrived group. I don't think that
anyone should assume they own anything just because they
happen to be there when no one else is. I know it all
depends on the situation, and that might should make
right in certain situation. Some lone player shouldn't
assume that he can get into rotation for a rare spawn
with a whole group. I personally don't think the GMs
should get involve, if 2 powerfull groups can't find a
working relationship and share items then they should
just compete for it, it's more realistic than bringing
the game masters into it, it totally disrupts the
whole roleplaying atmosphere. I think its a good rule
but it should be enforced rarely.
